name: Tayrel
aura: Increase Ally  in in all Battles by 25

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Humble
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +15%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. If the target is under a [Decrease ATK] debuff, it will place a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Singing Steel
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 50%. If the attack fully depletes the Turn Meter, it will place a [Stun] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Preemptive Strike
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
